page.title: 04THE AREA ABOVE HATHERSAGE.
page.content: WE DROVE TO HATHERSAGE TO THE CAR PARK BEHIND THE CHURCH AND WE WALKED TO A STILE WHERE MR. BEEVER TOOK OUR PHOTOGRAPH .THEN WE CLIMBED OVER THE STILE AND WALKED DOWN THE WOODLAND PATH THEN WE STOPPED, AS WE HAD SEEN A GREY SQUIRREL .THEN WE NOTICED THAT THE MOORLAND WAS USED FOR COWS INSTEAD OF SHEEP.WE WALKED THROUGH A FIELD AND WE SAW ANOTHER GREY SQUIRREL.WE WALKED THROUGH A GREEN DOOR AND WE SAW YET ANOTHER SQUIRREL. AND WE FOUND THAT THE WOOD WAS FULL OF YOUNG BEECH TREES. WE STARTED TO WALK BACK TO THE GREEN DOOR WHEN WE GOT THERE DANIEL WANTED TO PLAY POOSTICKS. WE GOT THROUGH THE DOOR AND TOOK A DIFFERENT ROUTE BACK. THEN WE WENT TO SEE LITTLE JOHNS GRAVE AND MR.BEEVER TOOK OUR PHOTOGRAPH AGAIN.AND WE WENT BACK TO THE CAR.
